timeline.bodyText: Can this affect the other versions that don't specify any families, like flush(TableName tableName)? Because region.flush(true), internally, loads all families before delegating to flushcache(List<byte[]> families, boolean writeFlushRequestWalMarker, FlushLifeCycleTracker tracker), but it doesn't seem we are doing this now.
